values:
is it worth noting that when you do a google image search for "existential fear" one of the first hits is dick cheney (which isn't too surprising)?

 i just noted it.

i just left feedback for a guy on ebay (latzo3, if you must know) and i've begun to repeat myself. you see "Praise: cellar door cellar door cellardoorcellardoorcellardoor toyota celica"  is an awful AWFUL lot like "Praise: toyota celica. toyota celica. toyota celica. toyota celica. toyota celica."

how could i let this happen? how could i slip? why do i care?

sigh.

ps i got fanmail for my feedback before.  i'm allowed to say things like that here cos this is my page about me and you shouldalljustbethankfullthati'mnotpostingpicturesofmycatsandwritingbadgothpoetry.
and i don't know how to make it non ugly. i suspect that it won't be easy. as a consolation here is a picture of a grown man dressed as a transformer...
